name: Carlos Rivera
backstory: Carlos grew up around vintage aircraft at his grandfather's restoration shop. For 28 years, he's specialized in bringing World War II-era aircraft back to flying condition. His expertise with radial engines and period-correct restoration techniques has made him sought after by museums and collectors worldwide.
teaching_style: Methodical approach emphasizing traditional techniques and understanding of mechanical systems. Uses historical context to explain aircraft design evolution.
signature_phrases: These old birds were built when engineering meant craftsmanship
Understanding how it was originally made helps you fix it right
Every vintage aircraft tells a story through its wear patterns
